snippets.code:
$RecycledItems = 1
$MaxCapacity = 500

while ($RecycledItems -le $MaxCapacity) {
    Write-Host "Item #$RecycledItems added to recycling bin"
    $RecycledItems += 50
}
Write-Host "Recycling bin is now full!"

snippets.description: While loop for tracking recycling bin capacity

snippets.code:
function Calculate-WasteReduction {
    param($OriginalWaste, $RecycledAmount)
    $Reduction = ($RecycledAmount / $OriginalWaste) * 100
    Write-Host "Waste reduction: $Reduction%"
    return $Reduction
}

Calculate-WasteReduction -OriginalWaste 1000 -RecycledAmount 750
snippets.title: Waste Reduction Calculator
